description: Effective pain relief and fever reducer. Suitable for headaches, muscle pain, arthritis, backache, toothaches, colds, and fevers. Safe for adults and children over 6 years.
Relieves pain and reduces inflammation. Ideal for treating minor aches and pains due to common cold, headaches, toothaches, muscle aches, arthritis, and menstrual cramps.
Low dose aspirin for heart health. Often recommended for daily use to reduce the risk of heart attack and stroke. Not suitable for children under 12 years.
Allergy relief medication. Provides 24-hour relief from symptoms of hay fever and other upper respiratory allergies such as runny nose, sneezing, itchy/watery eyes, and itching of the throat or nose.
Reduces stomach acid, treats heartburn. Used for short-term treatment of frequent heartburn that occurs 2 or more days per week. It may take 1 to 4 days for full effect.
Antibiotic for bacterial infections. Effective against various bacterial infections including pneumonia, bronchitis, and infections of the ears, nose, throat, skin, and urinary tract.
Non-drowsy allergy relief. Provides long-lasting relief from allergy symptoms like runny nose, sneezing, itchy/watery eyes, and itching of the nose or throat without causing drowsiness.
Helps control blood sugar levels. Commonly used for managing type 2 diabetes, it improves glucose tolerance and lowers both basal and postprandial plasma glucose levels.
Treats various types of infections. Broad-spectrum antibiotic used for respiratory infections, skin infections, ear infections, and sexually transmitted diseases.
Treats high blood pressure. Commonly prescribed for high blood pressure and heart failure, it works by relaxing blood vessels so blood can flow more easily.
